B. Cost of Land, Rights-of-Way, Property Damage, Easements, Etc.

The cost of land, rights-of-way, property damage or easements, as herein
tabulated, includes only the land required for the bridge and the abutments
on the Virginia shore, and the bridge, abutment, and approach together with
the area occupied by the toll plaza on the Maryland Shore.

As hereinbefore explained, the Virginia Highway Department has agreed
with the Maryland State Roads Commission to construct the Virginia
